org.apache.juneau.uon.annotation

Annotation Type UonConfig


  • @Documented
 @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
 @PropertyStoreApply(value=UonConfigApply.class)
public @interface UonConfig
    Annotation for specifying config properties defined in UonSerializer and UonParser.

    Used primarily for specifying bean configuration properties on REST classes and methods.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String addBeanTypes
      Configuration property: Add "_type" properties when needed.
      String decoding
      Configuration property: Decode "%xx" sequences.
      String encoding
      Configuration property: Encode non-valid URI characters.
      String paramFormat
      Configuration property: Format to use for query/form-data/header values.
      String validateEnd
      Configuration property: Validate end.

    • Element Detail

      • decoding

        public abstract String decoding
        Configuration property: Decode "%xx" sequences.

        Specify "true" if URI encoded characters should be decoded, "false" if they've already been decoded before being passed to this parser.

        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false"
        • The default is "false" for UonParser, "true" for UrlEncodingParser.
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "UonParser.decoding.b".
        • UonParser.UON_decoding
        Default:
        ""

      • validateEnd

        public abstract String validateEnd
        Configuration property: Validate end.

        If "true", after parsing a POJO from the input, verifies that the remaining input in the stream consists of only comments or whitespace.

        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false" (default)
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "UonParser.validateEnd.b".
        • UonParser.UON_validateEnd
        Default:
        ""

      • addBeanTypes

        public abstract String addBeanTypes
        Configuration property: Add "_type" properties when needed.

        If "true", then "_type" properties will be added to beans if their type cannot be inferred through reflection.

        When present, this value overrides the Serializer.SERIALIZER_addBeanTypes setting and is provided to customize the behavior of specific serializers in a SerializerGroup.

        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false" (default)
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "UonSerializer.addBeanTypes.b".
        • UonSerializer.UON_addBeanTypes
        Default:
        ""

      • encoding

        public abstract String encoding
        Configuration property: Encode non-valid URI characters.

        Encode non-valid URI characters with "%xx" constructs.

        If "true", non-valid URI characters will be converted to "%xx" sequences.
        Set to "false" if parameter value is being passed to some other code that will already perform URL-encoding of non-valid URI characters.

        Possible values:

        • "true"
        • "false"
        • Possible values:
          • "true"
          • "false"
        • The default is "false" for UonSerializer, "true" for UrlEncodingSerializer.
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "UonSerializer.encoding.b".
        • UonSerializer.UON_encoding
        Default:
        ""

      • paramFormat

        public abstract String paramFormat
        Configuration property: Format to use for query/form-data/header values.

        Specifies the format to use for URL GET parameter keys and values.

        • Possible values:
          • "UON" (default) - Use UON notation for parameters.
          • "PLAINTEXT" - Use plain text for parameters.
        • Supports Default SVL Variables (e.g. "$C{myConfigVar}").
        • A default global value can be set via the system property "UonSerializer.paramFormat.s".
        • UonSerializer.UON_paramFormat
        Default:
        ""
